ys.succinct.xml.dom

Class ElementStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • ys.succinct.xml.dom.ElementStore

  • public class ElementStore
extends Object
    An ordered store of the information about the following types of the XML nodes:
    • Node.DOCUMENT_NODE
    • Node.ELEMENT_NODE
    • Node.COMMENT_NODE
    • Node.CDATA_SECTION_NODE.

    The store holds the qualified names of the elements primarily as well as the types of the supported nodes.

    Author:
    Yauheni Shahun

    • Constructor Detail

      • ElementStore

        public ElementStore(ys.succinct.util.CompactIntArray nameIndexes,
            OrderedStore nameStore,
            ys.succinct.util.CompactIntArray namespaceIndexes,
            OrderedStore namespaceStore)
        Constructs an ElementStore.
        Parameters:
        nameIndexes - the compact array of the codes that point either to the node type or to the index of the element name
        nameStore - the store of the unique local names of the elements
        namespaceIndexes - the compact array that points to the indexes of the unique namespace URIs and prefixes of the elements
        namespaceStore - the store of the unique namespace URIs and prefixes of the elements

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public String getName(int index)
        Returns the local part of the element's qualified name.
        Parameters:
        index - the 0-based index of the element

      • getQName

        public String getQName(int index)
        Returns the element's qualified name i.e. the local name together with the prefix if it has been recognized during parsing. Otherwise, the prefix can be already included into the name part.
        Parameters:
        index - the 0-based index of the element

      • getNamespaceUri

        Parameters:
